description: Enjoy a fun 90-minute game of beach volleyball at Aasee Beach, perfect for staying active and socializing with friends on a hot day.

locationInfo.description: Aasee Beach is a popular spot for sports and relaxation. The sandy courts are perfect for a friendly game of beach volleyball while enjoying the heat of the summer.
safetyTips: Apply sunscreen before and during play.
Bring plenty of water to stay hydrated.

description: Cycle through the beautiful M端nsterland Park on a scenic route, with a mix of shade and sun to keep you cool while exploring the nature reserve.

locationInfo.lighting: Partially shaded with some open areas
locationInfo.description: M端nsterland Park offers a picturesque cycling route through nature, making it an ideal location to enjoy the summer weather with friends.
safetyTips: Keep a safe distance from other cyclists.

activity: Picnic and Boat Ride at Schloss Nordkirchen
description: Enjoy a relaxing picnic and a 90-minute boat ride around the beautiful castle grounds at Schloss Nordkirchen, offering a scenic and cool escape from the heat.

locationInfo.description: Schloss Nordkirchen is a stunning baroque palace with beautiful gardens, perfect for a peaceful boat ride and picnic with friends.
safetyTips: Bring sunscreen and hats for sun protection.
Stay hydrated with plenty of water.

description: Experience an exciting 90-minute kayaking trip along the Dortmund-Ems Canal, an ideal activity for beating the heat and enjoying the water.

locationInfo.description: The Dortmund-Ems Canal provides a refreshing water route for kayaking, perfect for cooling down during the hot summer months.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket at all times.
Check weather conditions and water levels before heading out.

description: Take part in a calming 90-minute outdoor yoga session in Gievenbecker Park, ideal for a relaxing activity in the fresh air during the warm summer weather.

locationInfo.description: Gievenbecker Park offers a tranquil and green space to enjoy outdoor yoga, with both sun and shade to provide a perfect environment for relaxation and stretching.
safetyTips: Use a yoga mat for added comfort.
